How it works

Your business will have odd jobs that crop up. These jobs can be anything: a video to edit, a new initiative to market, or a 3D render urgently required before building can begin.

Degree-certified professionals are waiting to help you out.

Informaiton for clients

Informaiton for Freelancers

How do I post a job?

Summary:

If you need any more info on these steps, we break them down in greater detail below. For now, here is a quick overview. We like to keep things simple here.

Steps:

1.) Submit a job here

2.) Await approval. Admin will email once your brief is sent out to the relevant freelancers. If your brief needs adjustment, we will be in touch to walk you through it.

3.) Proposal deadline. You set this in the job brief. At the given date, we will close the application window and send you all the freelancer proposals.

4.) Make your choice. Let us know who you want to work with, we will unite you via email and send out the relevant contracts.

5.) Complete the job!

6.) Payment. Once the job is complete to your satisfaction, we will send you an invoice for the agreed amount.

7.) Celebrate!
